data.description:
Grenades do 2d6+2 damage within a 30' radius. Grenades are on a timed fuse and do not explode until the end of the round, so characters may have time to dive for cover to avoid (or lessen) the blast, at the Referee’s discretion (see Explosives, pg. 50).

 

Grenades include the British Mills Bomb the American Mk II "pineapple" grenade, and the German "potato masher" stielhandgranate.
